title: A Giant Bid
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss the Phillies starting Aaron Nola over Zack Wheeler in Game 1 of the World Series, the reports that the Giants will not be outbid for Aaron Judge and if colleges are smart to fight the NFL for TV time.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The Phillies are starting Aaron Nola in Game 1 and the Giants are going after Judge.
